org.graphstream.algorithm
Interface Algorithm

All Known Subinterfaces:
DynamicAlgorithm
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSpanningTree, APSP, AStar, BellmanFord, ConnectedComponents, Dijkstra, ElementNervousness, GraphNervousness, Kruskal, Modularity, Prim, RandomWalk, WelshPowell
public interface Algorithm

This interface defines algorithms which can be run on a graph. Such algorithms are divided in two step :

  1. an initialization step
  2. a computing step
Complexity of algorithms can be specify in the documentation with the help of the "@complexity" tag.

Method Summary
 void compute()
          Launch the algorithm on the previously specified graph.
 void init(org.graphstream.graph.Graph graph)
          Initialization of the algorithm.
 

Method Detail

Parameters:
